item0.name: Lich Bane
item0.description:
70 Ability Power
10% Move Speed
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (150% base Attack Damage + 40% Ability Power) magic damage (2.5s cooldown).

item1.name: Oblivion Orb
item1.description:
30 Ability Power
  • Cursed: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item2.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item2.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item3.name: Riftmaker
item3.description:
80 Ability Power
300 Health
15 Ability Haste
8% Omnivamp
  • Void Corruption: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage (max 10%). At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2% Omnivamp and 8 Ability Power.

item4.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
item4.description:
18 Magic Penetration
45 Move Speed

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.3 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item0.name: Demonic Embrace
item0.description:
70 Ability Power
350 Health
  • Azakana Gaze: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for 1.2% max Health magic damage every second for 4 seconds. You gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist if a champion is affected (+2.5 Armor and Magic Resist for each additional champion affected).

item2.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
item2.description:
90 Ability Power
350 Health
15 Ability Haste

Active - Hex Bolt: Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage. Then, gain 30% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item3.name: Doran's Ring
item3.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item5.name: Mercury's Treads
item5.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item0.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item1.name: Riftmaker
item1.description:
80 Ability Power
300 Health
15 Ability Haste
8% Omnivamp
  • Void Corruption: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage (max 10%). At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2% Omnivamp and 8 Ability Power.

item2.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
item2.description:
18 Magic Penetration
45 Move Speed

item3.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
item3.description:
120 Ability Power
  • Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%.

item4.name: Morellonomicon
item4.description:
70 Ability Power
250 Health
  • Affliction: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item5.name: Lich Bane
item5.description:
70 Ability Power
10% Move Speed
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (150% base Attack Damage + 40% Ability Power) magic damage (2.5s cooldown).

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Refillable Potion
item0.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

  • Annul: Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

80 Health

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Refillable Potion
item0.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item1.name: Mercury's Treads
item1.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item2.name: Blasting Wand
item2.description: 40 Ability Power

item3.name: Doran's Ring
item3.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item4.name: Control Ward
item4.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item5.name: Riftmaker
item5.description:
80 Ability Power
300 Health
15 Ability Haste
8% Omnivamp
  • Void Corruption: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage (max 10%). At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2% Omnivamp and 8 Ability Power.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Broken Stopwatch
item0.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item1.name: Seeker's Armguard
item1.description:
20 Ability Power
15 Armor
  • Witch's Path: Killing a unit grants 1 Armor (max 30).

item2.name: Mercury's Treads
item2.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item3.name: Doran's Shield
item3.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

item4.name: Night Harvester
item4.description:
90 Ability Power
300 Health
15 Ability Haste
  • Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals an additional (125 +15% Ability Power magic damage) and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown per champion).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.3 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item0.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item0.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item2.description:
30 Ability Power
  • Cursed: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

45 Move Speed

item4.name: Demonic Embrace
item4.description:
70 Ability Power
350 Health
  • Azakana Gaze: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for 1.2% max Health magic damage every second for 4 seconds. You gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist if a champion is affected (+2.5 Armor and Magic Resist for each additional champion affected).

40 Health
